content.rendered:
Enrollment

  • Approximately 6,000 students across 6 campuses and online

Alumni

More than 85,000 worldwide

In the Classroom

  • More than 200 full-time professors
  • 14:1 student-to-faculty ratio
  • Average class size: 16 students

Founded

1891

President

Risa Dickson

Finances (2022-23)

  • Annual Institutional Financial Aid awarded to students: $63 million
  • Annual Budget: $196.5 million

Programs by College

College of Arts and Sciences

  • 35+ undergraduate programs

Cástulo de la Rocha College of Health and Community Well-Being

  • Three undergraduate programs
  • Five master’s degree programs
  • Doctorate in Clinical Psychology, PsyD

College of Law and Public Service

  • One undergraduate program
  • One master’s degree program
  • Juris Doctor, full and part-time programs
  • Doctorate in Public Administration
  • Dual-degree JD programs:
    • JD/MBA
    • JD/MPA
    • JD/Educational Leadership, MEd

College of Business

    • Six undergraduate programs
    • Five master’s degree programs
    • Ten certificate programs
    • Doctorate in Business Administration

LaFetra College of Education

  • Two undergraduate programs
  • Six master’s degree programs
  • Ten credential/certificate programs
  • Doctorate in Educational Leadership
  • Doctorate in Organizational Leadership
